Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players")
Camera = game:GetService("Workspace").CurrentCamera
Animations = {}
ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = (function(Mode, Value) if Mode == "PlayAnimation" and Humanoid then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == Value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Value.Animation) table.insert(Animations, {Animation = Value.Animation, AnimationTrack = AnimationTrack}) AnimationTrack:Play(Value.FadeTime, Value.Weight, Value.Speed) elseif Mode == "StopAnimation" and Value then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == Value then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end elseif Mode == "TargetPosition" then return PlayerMouse.Hit.p elseif Mode == "SetCameraType" and Value then pcall(function() Camera.CameraType = Value end) end end)
function InvokeServer(Mode, Value) pcall(function() local ServerReturn = ServerControl:InvokeServer(Mode, Value) return ServerReturn end) end
function CheckIfAlive() return (Player and Player.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end PlayerMouse = Player:GetMouse() Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() InvokeServer("MouseClick", {Down = true, Target = Mouse.Target}) end) Mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() InvokeServer("MouseClick", {Down = false, Target = Mouse.Target}) end) Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = true}) end) Mouse.KeyUp:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = false}) end) end
function Unequipped() for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.AnimationTrack then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() end end Animations = {} end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Animations = { ArmsOut = Tool:WaitForChild("ArmsOut") }
Sounds = { Handle:WaitForChild("Squeak1"), Handle:WaitForChild("Squeak2"), Handle:WaitForChild("Squeak3") }
BatManagement = script:WaitForChild("BatManagement") DirectionsGui = script:WaitForChild("DirectionsGui")
Damage = 5 MaxEnemyDistance = 100
Special = { Duration = 15, ReloadTime = 15, Ready = true, Active = false, }
Gravity = 196.20
Bats = {} LastSoundPlayed = 0
BatTarget = nil BatBoundaries = nil
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ServerControl.Name = "ServerControl" ServerControl.Parent = Tool
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ClientControl.Name = "ClientControl" ClientControl.Parent = Tool
DisplayModel = Tool:FindFirstChild("DisplayModel") if DisplayModel then DisplayModel:Destroy() end
Handle.Transparency = 0
Tool.Enabled = true
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = (function(player, Mode, Value) if player == Player and CheckIfAlive() --[[and BatsReady]] then if Mode == "MouseClick" and Value.Down and Value.Target and Value.Target.Parent and not Special.Active then local character = Value.Target.Parent if character:IsA("Hat") or character:IsA("Tool") then character = character.Parent end if character then local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local head = character:FindFirstChild("Head") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and head and (head.Position - Head.Position).magnitude <= MaxEnemyDistance then SetTarget(head) elseif Head and Head.Parent then SetTarget(Head) end end elseif Mode == "KeyPress" and Value.Down and Value.Key == "q" and Special.Ready and not Special.Active then CurrentCharacter = Character CurrentPlayer = Player CurrentHumanoid = Humanoid CurrentHead = Head CurrentTorso = Torso CurrentHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 Special.Ready = false Special.Active = true InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", {Animation = Animations.ArmsOut, FadeTime = 1, Weight = 1, Speed = 1}) local TotalBatCount = #Bats local BatCount = 0 local CurrentlyEquipped = true if UnequippedConnection then UnequippedConnection:disconnect() end UnequippedConnection = Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() CurrentlyEquipped = false if UnequippedConnection then UnequippedConnection:disconnect() end end) wait(2) if not CurrentlyEquipped then return end local CurrentPlayerGui = CurrentPlayer:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") if CurrentPlayerGui then DirectionsGuiClone = DirectionsGui:Clone() Debris:AddItem(DirectionsGuiClone, (Special.Duration + 5)) DirectionsGuiClone.Parent = CurrentPlayerGui end InvokeClient("SetCameraType", Enum.CameraType.Attach) RotationGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") RotationGyro.Name = "RotationGyro" RotationGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(0, math.huge, 0) for i = 1, 10 do if not CurrentlyEquipped then return end for ii, v in pairs(Bats) do if v.Bat and v.Bat.Parent then v.Bat.Transparency = (0.1 * i) if v.Bat.Transparency >= 1 then v.Bat:Destroy() end end end wait(0.1) end if CurrentlyEquipped then for i, v in pairs(Bats) do if v.Bat and v.Bat.Parent then v.Bat:Destroy() end end local LeftShoulder = CurrentTorso:FindFirstChild("Left Shoulder") local LeftArm = nil if LeftShoulder and LeftShoulder.Part1 and LeftShoulder.Part1.Parent then LeftArm = LeftShoulder.Part1 end local RightShoulder = CurrentTorso:FindFirstChild("Right Shoulder") local RightArm = nil if RightShoulder and RightShoulder.Part1 and RightShoulder.Part1.Parent then RightArm = RightShoulder.Part1 end if not LeftArm and not RightArm then return end RotationGyro.Parent = Torso local BeginTick = tick() local BatSpawnTick = 0 local BatSpawnDelay = 0.025 local LaunchedBats = {} Spawn(function() while Special.Active and CurrentlyEquipped do if #LaunchedBats > 0 then for i, v in pairs(LaunchedBats) do if type(v) ~= "table" then LaunchedBats[i] = {Bat = v, Angle = math.random(1, 2)} v = LaunchedBats[i] end if v.Bat and v.Bat.Parent then v.Bat.CFrame = v.Bat.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, ((math.random(1, 5) * 0.5) * ((v.Angle == 1 and 1) or -1))) else table.remove(LaunchedBats, i) end end end wait() end end) while (tick() - BeginTick) <= Special.Duration and LeftShoulder and LeftShoulder.Parent and LeftArm and LeftArm.Parent and RightShoulder and RightShoulder.Parent and RightArm and RightArm.Parent and CurrentlyEquipped do local TargetPosition = InvokeClient("TargetPosition", nil) RotationGyro.cframe = CFrame.new(Torso.Position, TargetPosition) if (BatSpawnTick == 0 or (tick() - BatSpawnTick) >= BatSpawnDelay) then BatSpawnTick = tick() if LeftShoulder and LeftShoulder.Parent and LeftArm and LeftArm.Parent then local LeftBat = LaunchBat(LeftArm) table.insert(LaunchedBats, LeftBat) end if RightShoulder and RightShoulder.Parent and RightArm and RightArm.Parent then local RightBat = LaunchBat(RightArm) table.insert(LaunchedBats, RightBat) end end wait(0.1) end if CurrentlyEquipped then InvokeClient("SetCameraType", Enum.CameraType.Custom) InvokeClient("StopAnimation", Animations.ArmsOut) for i, v in pairs({RotationGyro, DirectionsGuiClone}) do if v and v.Parent then v:Destroy() end end if CurrentHumanoid and CurrentHumanoid.Parent then CurrentHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end Delay(1, function() if CurrentlyEquipped then SetUpBats() end end) end Special.Active = false wait(Special.ReloadTime) Special.Ready = true end end end end)
function SetTarget(Object) if not Object or not Object.Parent then return end if TargetRemoved then TargetRemoved:disconnect() end TargetRemoved = Object.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not Object.Parent then if Head and Head.Parent then SetTarget(Head) end end end) BatTarget = Object BatBoundaries = ((BatTarget == Head and Ray.new(Vector3.new(-10, -2, -10), Vector3.new(10, 10, 10))) or Ray.new(Vector3.new(-10, -5, -10), Vector3.new(10, 5, 10))) end
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) local ReturnValue = nil pcall(function() ReturnValue = ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) return ReturnValue end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function PositionPart(Part, X, Y, Z) local PartClone = Part:Clone() local PartCloneY = PartClone:Clone() PartCloneY.CFrame = PartCloneY.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(-math.rad(90), 0, 0) PartCloneY.CFrame = PartCloneY.CFrame - PartCloneY.CFrame.lookVector * Y local PartCloneZ = PartCloneY:Clone() PartCloneZ.CFrame = PartCloneZ.CFrame + PartClone.CFrame.lookVector * Z local PartCloneX = PartCloneZ:Clone() PartCloneX.CFrame = PartCloneZ.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(90), 0) PartCloneX.CFrame = PartCloneX.CFrame - PartCloneX.CFrame.lookVector * X return PartCloneX.CFrame end
function IsFlipped(CFrame) local V1 = CFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.FromNormalId(Enum.NormalId.Top)) local V2 = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) local Angle = math.acos(V1:Dot(V2)) return (Angle > 2) end
function CreateBat() local Bat = Handle:Clone() Bat.Name = "Bat" Bat.Transparency = 0 Bat.Size = (Bat.Size / 2) Bat.Mesh.Scale = (Bat.Mesh.Scale / 2) Bat.CanCollide = false Bat.Anchored = true return Bat end
function BatTouched(Part, HitDamage, MinimumTransparency) Part.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent or Part.Transparency > MinimumTransparency or not Equipped then return end local humanoid = Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid ~= Humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(HitDamage) end end) end
function LaunchBat(SpawnPart) local Bat = CreateBat() Bat.Anchored = false local Mass = (Bat:GetMass() * Gravity) * 1.25 local BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(0, math.huge, 0) BodyGyro.Parent = Bat local BodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(Mass, Mass, Mass) BodyVelocity.Parent = Bat Bat.CFrame = SpawnPart.CFrame local BatCFrame = PositionPart(Bat, 0, 0, ((Bat.Size.Y / 2) + (SpawnPart.Size.Z / 2))) * CFrame.Angles(0, -(math.pi / 2), 0) BodyGyro.cframe = BatCFrame BodyVelocity.velocity = BatCFrame.lookVector * 50 Delay(1, function() for i = 1, 10 do if Bat and Bat.Parent then Bat.Transparency = (0.1 * i) if Bat.Transparency >= 1 then Bat:Destroy() end end wait(0.1) end end) BatTouched(Bat, Damage, 0.75) Debris:AddItem(Bat, 2) Bat.Parent = BatModel Bat.CFrame = BatCFrame Bat.Velocity = BodyVelocity.velocity return Bat end
function CreateBats() for i = 1, 15 do local Bat = CreateBat() local BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(math.huge, math.huge, math.huge) BodyGyro.Parent = Bat local Mass = (Bat:GetMass() * Gravity * 1.25) local BodyPosition = Instance.new("BodyPosition") BodyPosition.D = 10000 BodyPosition.P = 20000 BodyPosition.maxForce = Vector3.new(Mass, Mass, Mass) BodyPosition.Parent = Bat BatTouched(Bat, Damage, 0) table.insert(Bats, {Bat = Bat, BodyGyro = BodyGyro, BodyPosition = BodyPosition, Origin = {CFrame = nil, Nearby = false, Traveling = false}, TargetPoint = nil}) end end
function PlaceBats() if BatModel and BatModel.Parent then BatModel:Destroy() end BatModel = Instance.new("Model") BatModel.Name = Player.Name .. "'s Bats" local BatManagementClone = BatManagement:Clone() local CreatorValue = Instance.new("ObjectValue") CreatorValue.Name = "Creator" CreatorValue.Value = Player CreatorValue.Parent = BatManagementClone local ToolValue = Instance.new("ObjectValue") ToolValue.Name = "Tool" ToolValue.Value = Tool ToolValue.Parent = BatManagementClone BatManagementClone.Disabled = false BatManagementClone.Parent = BatModel for i, v in pairs(Bats) do if v.Bat and v.BodyGyro and v.BodyPosition then PositionBats(BatTarget) v.Bat.Transparency = 1 v.Bat.Parent = BatModel end end BatModel.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") for i, v in pairs(Bats) do --v.Bat.CFrame = v.Origin.CFrame --Enables bats to appear flying around already when you equip this tool v.Bat.Anchored = false end BatsReady = false Spawn(function() for i = 1, 10 do for ii, v in pairs(Bats) do if v.Bat and v.Bat.Parent then v.Bat.Transparency = (1 - (0.1 * i)) end end wait(0.1) end BatsReady = true end) end
function PositionBats(Origin) for i, v in pairs(Bats) do if (not v.Origin.Nearby and not v.Traveling) or not v.Origin.CFrame then v.Origin.Traveling = true local TargetPoint = PositionPart(Origin, math.random(BatBoundaries.Origin.X, BatBoundaries.Direction.X), math.random(BatBoundaries.Origin.Y, BatBoundaries.Direction.Y), math.random(BatBoundaries.Origin.Z, BatBoundaries.Direction.Z)) * CFrame.Angles(math.random(-math.pi, math.pi), math.random(-math.pi, math.pi), math.random(-math.pi, math.pi)) TargetPoint = TargetPoint * CFrame.Angles(((IsFlipped(TargetPoint) and math.pi) or 0), 0, 0) v.Origin.CFrame = TargetPoint v.BodyGyro.cframe = CFrame.new(v.Bat.Position, TargetPoint.p) v.BodyPosition.position = TargetPoint.p if v.Origin.CFrame and (v.Bat.Position - v.Origin.CFrame.p).magnitude <= 6 then v.Traveling = false v.Origin.Nearby = true end else v.Origin.Nearby = false end end end
function FunctionBats() while BatModel and BatModel.Parent do if not BatTarget then SetTarget(Head) elseif BatTarget ~= Head then local humanoid = BatTarget.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not humanoid or humanoid.Health == 0 then SetTarget(Head) end end PositionBats(BatTarget) if (LastSoundPlayed == 0 or (tick() - LastSoundPlayed) >= 1) then local PlaySound = math.random(1, 5) if PlaySound == 5 then LastSoundPlayed = tick() Sounds[math.random(1, #Sounds)]:Play() end end wait(0.25) end end
function SetUpBats() Spawn(function() if BatModel and BatModel.Parent then BatModel:Destroy() end for i, v in pairs(Bats) do if v.Bat and v.Bat.Parent then v.Bat:Destroy() end end Bats = {} SetTarget(Head) CreateBats() PlaceBats() FunctionBats() end) end
function CheckIfAlive(Current) return (Character and Character.Parent and Player and Player.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Head and Head.Parent and Torso and Torso.Parent) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Spawn(function() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Head = Character:FindFirstChild("Head") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end Equipped = true Handle.Transparency = 1 SetUpBats() end) end
function Unequipped() Equipped = false for i, v in pairs({BatModel, RotationGyro, DirectionsGuiClone}) do if v and v.Parent then v:Destroy() end end Bats = {} BatTarget = nil BatBoundaries = nil BatsReady = false Special.Active = false if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end Spawn(function() InvokeClient("SetCameraType", Enum.CameraType.Custom) InvokeClient("StopAnimation", Animations.ArmsOut) end) Handle.Transparency = 0 end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Model = script.Parent
Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Creator = script:FindFirstChild("Creator") Tool = script:FindFirstChild("Tool")
FixCamera = script:FindFirstChild("FixCamera")
function DestroyModel() if Player and Player.Parent then if FixCamera then if Character and Character.Parent then local FixCameraClone = FixCamera:Clone() FixCameraClone.Disabled = false FixCameraClone.Parent = Character end local Backpack = Player:FindFirstChild("Backpack") if Backpack then local FixCameraClone = FixCamera:Clone() FixCameraClone.Disabled = false FixCameraClone.Parent = Backpack end end end Debris:AddItem(Model, 2) end
if not Creator or not Creator.Value or not Creator.Value.Parent or not Tool or not Tool.Value or not Tool.Value.Parent then DestroyModel() return end
ToolObject = Tool.Value Player = Creator.Value
if not Player or not Player:IsA("Player") then DestroyModel() return end
Character = Player.Character if not Character or not Character.Parent then DestroyModel() return end
Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then DestroyModel() return end
Humanoid.Died:connect(function() DestroyModel() end)
Player.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Character" then DestroyModel() end end)
ToolObject.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not ToolObject.Parent then DestroyModel() end end)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
pcall(function() Camera = game:GetService("Workspace").CurrentCamera Camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Custom end)
Debris:AddItem(script, 2)

Properties.string: < Move your mouse sideways to turn. >
